context.p: A Configuration is an artifact that holds information about default values for Pods and Products:

ul.li: Product: Name, Load Value and Timeout Value.
Configurations are only accessable to Admin users.

context.p: The list page provides a list-view for Configurations.
The configuration-view page provides a view where current information for the artifact can be viewed.

ul.li: Default Pod Load Tolerance: Value that is used for when a Pod is created and no value for Load Tolerance is passed.

ol.li: Product Name: Name for a Product.
Product Load Value: Value that is used for when a Product is created and no value for Load Value is passed.
Product Timeout Value: Value that is used for when a Product is created and no value for Timeout Value is passed.
